lenstype: Nikon F mount (with AF coupling and AF contacts)
flashmodes: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction, auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash, red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction, rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off; Auto FP High-Speed Sync supported
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Phase Detect, Multi-Area, Center, Selective Single Point, Tracking, Single, Continuous, Face Detection, Live View, Nikon Advanced Multi-CAM 3500DX autofocus sensor module with TTL phase detection, fine-tuning, 51 focus points (including 15 cross-type sensors; the center 1 focus point is available at apertures slower than f/5.6 and faster than f/8 or at f/8), and AF-assist illuminator (range approx. 0.5 - 3m/1 ft 8 in. - 9 ft 10 in.), Focus Lock
whitebalancing: Custom White Balance, White Balance Presets (12), Auto (2 Types), Incandescent, Fluorescent (7 Types), Direct Sunlight, Flash, Cloudy, Shade, Preset Manual (upto 6 Values can be Stored, Spot Measurement Available During Live View), Choose Color Temperature (2500 K 10000 K), Fine-tuning
otherfocusfeatures: Focal Length Multiplier (1.5x), No. of Focus Points (51)
dustreduction: Yes, Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
builtinflash: Yes, Auto, portrait, child, close up, night portrait, party/indoor, pet portrait, color sketch: Auto flash with auto pop-up P, S, A, M, food: Manual pop-up with button release
shootingmodes: Auto, Programmed Auto with Flexible Program (P), Shutter-priority (S), Aperture-priority (A), Manual (M)
display: 3.2 inch Wide Viewing Angle TFT-LCD monitor
